programme.title: Megaboa
programme.desc: On a trip to Colombia, a group of college students encounter a sixty-foot boa constrictor.

programme.title: Maniac Cop 2
programme.desc: N.Y. detective (Robert Davi) hunts the unreal title character.

programme.title: My Friend Dahmer
programme.desc: The true, haunting story of future serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer as a shy adolescent in high school.

programme.title: 666: The Child
programme.desc: An affluent couple (Adam Vincent, Sarah Lieving) adopt an orphaned boy who is pure evil.

programme.title: Bull Shark
programme.desc: A hungry shark begins feeding on unsuspecting lakegoers in a small Texas town.

programme.title: Bloodwork
programme.desc: College students learn to regret their decision to sign up as test subjects for a new drug.

programme.title: Frankenstein
programme.desc: An adaptation of "Frankenstein" in which a married couple of scientists create a modern-day monster.

programme.title: Crush
programme.desc: A secret admirer's crush on a high school athlete takes a fatal turn in this tense thriller.

programme.title: Day of the Dead
programme.desc: After zombies take over the world, a group of survivors struggles to survive within a bunker.

programme.title: FilmRise Horror
programme.desc: Scream along to horror classics like GINGER SNAPS, DAY OF THE DEAD and DRACULA, and witness weird supernatural tales starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Sydney Sweeney, Dan Stevens and other stars.

programme.desc: A team of ghost hunters is determined to capture the spirits of their loved ones.

programme.desc: After losing her child, Olivia (Katie Leclerc) meets a woman and her daughter and becomes obsessed.
